Title: Defines academic excellence relating to the New York state masters-in-education teacher incentive scholarship program
Summary: Defines academic excellence relating to the New York state masters-in-education teacher incentive scholarship program as having a grade point average of three and one half or more on a four point scale.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to defining academic excellence relating to the New York state masters-in-education teacher incentive scholarship program
